ing: 1 pound lean beef, cut into strips
1 cup UNCLE BEN'SÂ® Flavor Infusions Garlic & Butter Rice
des: "Beef, mushrooms, broccoli-what more could you want in a delicious, family-pleasing meal? Oh, yes, it's quick and easy to make, too! The next time your family wants something beefy, turn to this recipe. You'll look like a hero."
ins:
In a skillet, over medium-high heat, add butter, then brown the beef until golden brown.
Add onions and mushrooms, and cook for another 2 to 3 minutes, or until onions are translucent.
Stir in broccoli, UNCLE BEN'S(R) Flavor Infusions Garlic & Butter Rice, and water.
Bring to boil, then reduce to medium heat and simmer covered for 15 minutes or until water is absorbed.
